republish_success: All articles have been republished and deployed
unpublish_selection_prompt: Please enter the numbers to unpublish (comma separated, leave empty to cancel):

preview_url: Please visit http://localhost:1313 to view preview

update_publish_error: Error updating publish field of file {md_file}: {error}

deploy_step_checkout: 1. Switch to main branch and pull latest code
image_processing_error: Error processing images: {error}, will continue processing
tag_category_error: Error processing tags and categories: {error}, will continue processing
unexpected_error: An unexpected error occurred during execution: {error}
source_dir_not_exist: Error: Source directory {source_dir} does not exist
hugo_dir_not_exist: Error: Hugo directory {hugo_dir} does not exist
select_article_prompt: Please select article numbers to publish (comma separated, input 'all' to select all, leave empty to cancel):

confirm_action_prompt: Confirm to perform the above actions? [y/N]:
cli_description: Publish Markdown files to Hugo blog and deploy to GitHub Pages
cli_republish_help: Unpublish all articles and republish them
cli_lang_help: Set language (default: taken from LANG environment variable)
cli_no_interactive_requires_option: Non-interactive mode requires other options like --files, --republish, or --preview
